code: import axios from'axios';const ADZUNA_CONFIG={APP_ID:'b0c96f50',APP_KEY:'4406b7e81a8177d76e6add44f1ff6c67'};export async function searchAdzuna(){try{var _response$data;const response=await axios.get('/v1/api/jobs/gb/search/1',{params:{app_id:ADZUNA_CONFIG.APP_ID,app_key:ADZUNA_CONFIG.APP_KEY,results_per_page:50,what:'software developer'},headers:{'Accept':'application/json'}});if(!((_response$data=response.data)!==null&&_response$data!==void 0&&_response$data.results)){return[];}return response.data.results.map(job=>{var _job$company,_job$location;return{id:`adzuna-${job.id}`,title:job.title,company:((_job$company=job.company)===null||_job$company===void 0?void 0:_job$company.display_name)||'Unknown',location:((_job$location=job.location)===null||_job$location===void 0?void 0:_job$location.display_name)||'Unknown',type:job.contract_time||'Unknown',salary:job.salary_min?`£${job.salary_min} - £${job.salary_max}`:null,postedDate:job.created,applyLink:job.redirect_url,description:job.description||'',source:'Adzuna'};});}catch(error){console.error('Adzuna API Error:',error.message);return[];}}
